Class LuceneLocationResolverTest

java.lang.Object
  com.bericotech.clavin.resolver.LuceneLocationResolverTest

public class LuceneLocationResolverTest
extends Object

Ensures non-heuristic matching and fuzzy matching features are working properly in LuceneLocationResolver.
